mapper.select: select p.POSITION_id,p.position_name,p.position_group_id,g.position_group_name,p.update_time, (select count(a.POSITION_ID) from application a where a.APPLICATION_STATUS=1 and a.POSITION_ID = p.POSITION_ID) as unreadapp_num, (select count(a.POSITION_ID) from application a where a.POSITION_ID = p.POSITION_ID) as allapp_num from POSITION p, position_group g where p.position_group_id = g.position_group_id ORDER by p.UPDATE_TIME desc
SELECT POSITION_ID, POSITION_NAME, POSITION_DESCRIPTION, RESPONSIBILITIES, REQUIREMENTS, SALARY FROM POSITION WHERE POSITION_ID = #{positionId}
